sentences.sentence: "He has had his tonsils out and has been ill, too," she noted in her diary.
sentences.translation: “他已经做了扁桃腺切除，又一直在生病。”她在自己的日记中写道。

sentences.sentence: Backache, nausea, and dodgy tonsils—these are just some of the symptoms caused by stones in your body.
sentences.translation: 背痛、恶心、扁桃腺炎——这些都是由体内结石造成的症状。

sentences.sentence: The doctor cut out his tonsils.
sentences.translation: 医生切除了他的扁桃腺。
